chapters.title: Chapter 3: Pale Shadows
chapters.info: Garan, p. 108 (78)—Aiel of the Black Rock sept of the Goshien Aiel. He has served one year as gai'shain to the Shaarad Clan, and as soon as he puts off the white will be married to Joinde of the Black Rock Shaarad. Marriages are common among men and women taken gai'shain and members of the clan they serve, but very seldom occur between two clans in blood feud. The fact that theirs will occur is no doubt due to the presence of Rand al'Thor, whose chance-twisting effects of being ta'veren twist seldom occurences into everyday events. See also Joinde.
